民族性: (みんぞくせい) - racial or national characteristics
民族服: (みんぞくふく) - folk costume; traditional clothing; national clothing
民族浄化: (みんぞくじょうか) - ethnic cleansing
民族独立: (みんぞくどくりつ) - tribal independence
民族的: (みんぞくてき) - ethnic; racial; national
民族精神: (みんぞくせいしん) - racial spirit; national spirit
民族紛争: (みんぞくふんそう) - ethnic conflict
民族統一主義: (みんぞくとういつしゅぎ) - irredentism
民族自決: (みんぞくじけつ) - (yoji) self-determination of peoples
民族衣装: (みんぞくいしょう) - national costume; (in) native dress
民族解放: (みんぞくかいほう) - national liberation
民族解放戦争: (みんぞくかいほうせんそう) - war of national liberation
民族解放運動: (みんぞくかいほううんどう) - national liberation movement

民族音楽: (みんぞくおんがく) - ethnic music
民暴: (ミンボー) - racketeering by interceding in civil disputes and threatening the use of violence
民有地: (みんゆうち) - private land; privately-owned land
民有林: (みんゆうりん) - privately owned forest
民望: (みんぼう) - hopes of the people
民権主義: (みんけんしゅぎ) - democracy (as propounded by Sun Yat-sen)
民民規制: (みんみんきせい) - min-min kisei; deals between companies which restrict competition
民泊: (みんぱく) - private residence temporarily taking lodgers
民法: (みんぽう) - civil law; civil code
民法上の身分: (みんぽうじょうのみぶん) - civil status; status (of a person) under the Civil Code
民生: (みんせい) - consumer; civilian; people's welfare or livelihood
民生委員: (みんせいいいん) - district welfare officer
民社党: (みんしゃとう) - Democratic Socialist Party
民芸: (みんげい) - folk craft; folk art
民芸品: (みんげいひん) - (article of) folk craft
民衆扇動: (みんしゅうせんどう) - demagoguery; demagogy
民衆文化: (みんしゅうぶんか) - popular culture
民衆駅: (みんしゅうえき) - railway station built with government and popular support
民謡音階: (みんようおんかい) - folk scale (anhemitonic pentatonic scale: mi, so, la, ti, re)
民譚集: (みんだんしゅう) - collection of folk stories
民進党: (みんしんとう) - Democratic Progressive Party (Taiwan)
民部省: (たみのつかさ) - (みんぶしょう only) Ministry of Popular Affairs (1869-1871); Ministry of Popular Affairs (under the ritsuryo system)
民間: (みんかん) - private; civilian; civil; popular; folk; unofficial
民間人: (みんかんじん) - non-government person; civilian
民間企業: (みんかんきぎょう) - private enterprise; private business; private company; private firm; private-sector business; private-sector corporation
民間会社: (みんかんかいしゃ) - private company; private corporation
民間信仰: (みんかんしんこう) - folk beliefs; folk religion
民間債権: (みんかんさいけん) - private debt
民間分類: (みんかんぶんるい) - folk taxonomy
民間団体: (みんかんだんたい) - nongovernment organization (organisation); NGO
民間外交: (みんかんがいこう) - popular diplomacy; public diplomacy; people's diplomacy; diplomacy carried out by non-government officials
民間放送: (みんかんほうそう) - commercial broadcasting
民間放送局: (みんかんほうそうきょく) - commercial broadcaster; commercial radio or TV station
民間療法: (みんかんりょうほう) - folk remedies
民間航空機: (みんかんこうくうき) - private aircraft
民間調査機関: (みんかんちょうさきかん) - private investigation agency
民間賃貸住宅: (みんかんちんたいじゅうたく) - privately rented housing
民間軍事会社: (みんかんぐんじがいしゃ) - private military company
民青: (みんせい) - Democratic Youth League of Japan
気: (ki/ke) - feeling , spirit, mind, heart; nature, disposition; motivation, intention; mood, feelings
気おされる: (けおされる) - to be overawed; to be overpowered; to lose the mental battle
気がある: (きがある) - to have an interest (in something); to feel inclined (toward doing something)
気がきく: (きがきく) - to be sensible/to be smart/to be tasteful; to be thoughtful/to be tactful/to be sensitive
気がすすまない: (きがすすまない) - reluctant to; not inclined to; disinclined; unwilling
気がすまない: (きがすまない) - not to be able to settle down (if something is not done); must (do something)
気がすむ: (きがすむ) - to be satisfied; to feel good
気がする: (きがする) - to have a certain mood or feeling; to have a hunch
気がせく: (きがせく) - to feel under pressure; to feel impatient; to be in a hurry
気がそがれる: (きがそがれる) - to be discouraged (from doing something); to have one's enthusiasm dampened
気がたつ: (きがたつ) - to be excited about; to get all worked up about
気がちる: (きがちる) - to get distracted; to jump off the track
気がつく: (きがつく) - to notice/to become aware/to perceive/to realize/to realise; to be scrupulous/to be attentive; to recover consciousness/to come to oneself
気がつくと: (きがつくと) - before I knew it; next thing you know; when I came to
気がとがめる: (きがとがめる) - to feel guilty; to suffer from a guilty conscience; to feel uneasy; to have qualms about; to have scruples about; to feel regret
